title: Face Expression Recognition
tagline: HOG feature pipeline trained with an RBF SVM on CK+.
description: Classical CV training flow that loads CK+ frames, normalizes them to 64x64 grayscale, extracts HOG descriptors, and trains an RBF SVM. Includes evaluation output plus a saved svm_model.joblib artifact and a small inference script for single-image predictions.
highlights: HOG descriptors with 7 orientations, 8x8 cells, 4x4 blocks
Inference script loads the saved model for one-off predictions
